Articles.Content:
I am now hosting a DMP server named "Mostly Vanilla", it will be career mode, and it will require a few mods.

Download the latest version of the mods and the client, or the server is unplayable if you are missing even one mod.

The mods are:

DMP Client

Tech Manager

FAR

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

ADIOS

CollisionFX

KAX

These shouldn't take too long to install, and if you are having RAM issues, please do get ActiveTextureManagement which compresses the ingame textures by only a little bit, allowing you to run faster and smoother and use better graphic settings.

If you want a Mk 1 cockpit internal view, here you go to fix your issues with the IVA in that cockpit. My F6F Hellkat (not Hellcat) now looks as well as it flies!

The above mods are required, except the Mk 1 Inline cockpit internals, because otherwise things will go wonky and something will be devoured by the space Kraken.

IP: 174.69.35.29

Port: 55905

The difficulty is to the hardest, so be careful about what you do, and remember to preserve your Kerbals because they cost a fortune.

If you want to communicate with users better, add me on Skype (Techiastronamo) and I'll put you into a Skype group for the server.

Good luck with your new space program,

~Techiastronamo

Notice: When you load into the server, enable Tech Manager and select ADIOS, you may try to use the others they but have not been tested.

Edited February 1, 2015 by Techiastronamo
Message me on Skype or Steam (Techiastronamo) if you can't connect. It is most likely because the server is down.

While its great to see new servers, i refuse to run FAR as it is buggy and i avoid clunky interfaces, make that NEAR and ill consider it, otherwise its unlikely you will see me around.

unless ofc i really feel like replacing the FAR.dll with a blank dll renamed to FAR.dll's original name that doesnt actually do anything. DMP while a great mod, isnt exactly hard to trick. You cant add mods if the server doesnt allow any mods, but you sure can replace a required mod with any other mod or what i do, a blank text file that loads but doesnt do anything.

While its great to see new servers, i refuse to run FAR as it is buggy and i avoid clunky interfaces, make that NEAR and ill consider it, otherwise its unlikely you will see me around.

unless ofc i really feel like replacing the FAR.dll with a blank dll renamed to FAR.dll's original name that doesnt actually do anything. DMP while a great mod, isnt exactly hard to trick. You cant add mods if the server doesnt allow any mods, but you sure can replace a required mod with any other mod or what i do, a blank text file that loads but doesnt do anything.

I made sure it allows mods. And how is FAR buggy? The only buggy thing is the current vanilla aerodynamic modeling. I might make it NEAR if others complain as well. And tricking DMP is pretty easy as you said, but then you're missing parts or whatever and the game will get glitchy or whatever and bad things happen.
